ygData.subject: exploits?
ygData.msgSnippet: Besides, what s the point?  Where s the challenge to using an exploit? Are we racing to get to 50level?  It s already been done almost a month ago...no point
ygData.messageBody:
Besides, what's the point? Where's the challenge to using an exploit?
Are we racing to get to 50level? It's already been done almost a month
ago...no point to that.

Are we trying to get unique items? I think everything cool has already been
found save for a handful of new ones.

So if you're not racing to get any bragging rights...just enjoy the game the
way it was intended to be played. To each his own...but I get no bigger
thrill than working with friends to get cool items and achieving each level
one step at a time...who cares how long it takes? We all KNOW we'll all get
to 50Level one day with all the trimmings...so why rush?

I know this isn't going to sway those of you intent on using exploits to get
your way. Do what you must. Just please keep quiet about it then ok? or
even do us a favor and post headers with *exploits*

-- Lim'Dul
20 Wiz Veeshan

>I just wanted to clarify that I have never used an exploit in my EQ life
>and I am not planning to do so in the future. I was just against the
idea. But then I realized that ignorant idiots like the above poster
>think they have an ally in me, and that really made me sick.

>HTH, HAND.

--
>Sergey
